name: GTA Item Placement File
summary: Game file used by some Grand Theft Auto (GTA) games such as GTA III and GTA: Vice City; saves item placement information within a map and may include objects, spawn points, weapon locations, and custom zone information; saved in a text format and can be edited with a text editor.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rockstar Games Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
